name: The Settlers 7: History Edition
description:
Let yourself be enchanted by the new world of Settlers in this modernized History Edition – in the midst of green forests and lush meadows, it will bustle again. You alone hold the fate of your kingdom in your hands. Which strategy will you choose? Whether as a well-read scientist, crafty merchant, or brave general – it is up to you to build a prosperous kingdom with power and prestige.
IMPROVEMENT HIGHLIGHTS: Windows 10 compatible
